7   package org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal;
8   
9   import org.jboss.logging.BasicLogger;
10  import org.jboss.logging.Logger;
11  import org.jboss.logging.annotations.LogMessage;
12  import org.jboss.logging.annotations.Message;
13  import org.jboss.logging.annotations.MessageLogger;
14  import org.jboss.logging.annotations.ValidIdRange;
15  
16  import static org.hibernate.internal.log.DeprecationLogger.CATEGORY;
17  import static org.jboss.logging.Logger.Level.WARN;
18  
19  /**
20   * @author Steve Ebersole
21   */
22  @MessageLogger(projectCode = "HHH")
23  @ValidIdRange( min = 20100, max = 20100)
24  public interface DeprecationLogger extends BasicLogger {
25  	/**
26  	 * Singleton access
27  	 */
28  	DeprecationLogger INSTANCE = Logger.getMessageLogger(
29  			DeprecationLogger.class,
30  			CATEGORY
31  	);
32  
33  	/**
34  	 * Log a message (WARN) about this provider being deprecated
35  	 */
36  	@LogMessage(level = WARN)
37  	@Message(
38  			value = "The Ehcache second-level cache provider for Hibernate is deprecated.  " +
39  					"See https://hibernate.atlassian.net/browse/HHH-12441 for details.",
40  			id = 20100
41  	)
42  	void logDeprecation();
43  
44  }
